menu_beemovie_toggle_enabled_desc: Check this box to enable the mod.
menu_beemovie_change_message_interval_de: Delay (in seconds) between sending each line of the Bee Movie.
menu_beemovie_dialog_enabled: Keyword listener and script output enabled. You can disable it again in the mod options menu, or by saying "$word" in chat.
menu_beemovie_dialog_disabled: Keyword listener and script output disabled. You can re-enable it again in the mod options menu, or by saying "$word" in chat.
